plot: Ricardo leads a somewhat mundane menial life. He wishes for more. One day an imaginary snake appears on his arm only he can talk to and see. With the help of his new "companion" his life is never the same again.
title: Rattle
plot_es: Ricardo leads a somewhat mundane menial life. He wishes for more. One day an imaginary snake appears on his arm only he can talk to and see. With the help of his new "companion" his life is never the same again.
plot_en: Ricardo leads a somewhat mundane menial life. He wishes for more. One day an imaginary snake appears on his arm only he can talk to and see. With the help of his new "companion" his life is never the same again.
